pages.text: Empowered by the potent energy of your onyxes, this second organism is clearly... more active than your last creation.$(br2)$(bold)And DEFINITELY hungrier.
Maybe one of the strongest materials you know can satisfy their hunger?

pages.title: Neolith
pages.text: The obsidian was literally pulverized by your experiment. This is what you call power!$(br2)The result was this sturdy reagent.
